KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Academic Readiness Anti Reqs
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Anti req used in the evaluation of a person's academic readiness for enrollment in an LU.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Academic Readiness Co Reqs
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Co req used in the evaluation of a person's academic readiness for enrollment in an LU.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Overall Academic Readiness Rules
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Rules used in the evaluation of a person's academic readiness for enrollment in an LU.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Academic Readiness Enroll Reqs
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Enrollment req used in the evaluation of a person's academic readiness for enrollment in an LU.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Academic Readiness Pre Reqs
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Pre req rules used in the evaluation of a person's academic readiness for enrollment in an LU.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Program Academic Readiness Rules
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Rules used in the evaluation of a person''s academic readiness for acceptance into a program (e.g. major).

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Program Entry Rules
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Rules used in the evaluation of a person''s entry into a program (e.g. major).

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Program Satisfactory Progress Rules
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Rules used in maintaining minimum scholarship standards.

KSST_STMT_TYPE.NAME: Program Completion Rules
KSST_STMT_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Rules used in the evaluation of a person''s program (e.g. major) completion.
